Description: Blue glazed composition shabti with painted detail: a black lappet-wig, a modelled face with black features, a black collar, parallel hands in relief with black bracelets and holding two black hoes, the back is decorated with a representation of a seed-basket and a yoke with two pendular nw-pots, the front of the leg section is inscribed with black painted hieroglyphs, the lower leg section has broken away.
Condition: incomplete - lower leg and foot section missing
